original_title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse - Mickey & Pluto to The Rescue
overview: There's no mountain too high or problem too big to solve with Mickey & Pluto To The Rescue! Pluto loves to play catch, but when his super duper bouncy ball bounces far away, he'll need the right mouseketools and YOUR help to find and fetch his missing toy.
title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse - Mickey & Pluto to The Rescue
